title: New Shen
body:
I truly believe, with the new rework, Shen will be a true jungler, even outweighing his position in Top. With his new q doing more damage to minions and monsters, he'll have a better time in the jungle, and the autoattack dodges will help a ton as well.

I'd like to know what the community thinks about these changes.

replies.body: I'm not keen at all for his changes. I'm trying not to just judge them on face value but so far i'm disappointed about everything they changed. I enjoy Shen quite a lot as he is.

i think is poke is weaker, his bursh damage is weaker, his sustain is weaker and his overall shielding potential is also weaker. The only potential benefit i see is that he will do more damage in trades his he procs his attackspeed boost and hits them 3 times

His e cd is higher.
